name: Attack of the Kraken (itch) (nfalcone)
description:
I am so sorry about this being so late and if im going to be quite honest its just cause I had alot of trouble with it, probably over 30 hours of work for this so hope you enjoy. Anyway my first modification was changing the space ship to a pirate ship, you now have to sail through the water killing aliens until finally the final boss, the Kraken appears. My second modification was what I did with the User Interface, I changed the font and colorway of the interface and overall I think it just made it a bit easier on the eyes. Lastly I edited the Straightshooter so that it evolved into a harder mob and I also edited it to look alot cooler. Hope you enjoy my project!

Created by Nick Falcone.
